constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PALLONE:
H.R. 4251.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H3580]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

title: Native Behavioral Health Access Improvement Act of 2021
